name: Generation Why?!
description:
“Your life is a currency”: for no other person in the world this statement is more true than for instagramm models.

Play as one of these poor souls trying to become famous by making degrading pictures of themselves and their desperate attempt to get followers and likes. Give your best by making selfies with potential followers and find the three legendery selfiespots, or you will be doomed with a 9till5-job.

Your coolness is your life and it will decrease by touching weebs or hobos, so stay away from these filthy people. You can restore your coolness by taking selfies with followers and can get extra coolness if you collected a pumpkin-spice-latte for the purrrfect picture!

So get ready and chase your dream to become a famous model on TurtleGramm!

Controls

WASD! - you know this come on!

SPACE - Jump!

E - Selfietime!!!
